#Text= Asami says : " I think you might have been a little over-aggressive with the airbending .

column1: #Text=The controls are busted .
#Text=Also , you broke the radio .
#Text=" Korra says : " Sorry , but it 's not my fault this airship 's a hunk of junk .
#Text=" Asami says : " Hang on to something !
#Text=" Asami says : " Well .
#Text=They say any landing you could walk away from is a good landing .
#Text=But , given our location , I 'm not so sure about that .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're the engineer .
#Text=What do you think ?
#Text=Can we get flying again ?
#Text=" Asami says : " It does n't look good .
#Text=Even if you metalbend the propellers back into shape , we have to dig this whole thing out of the sand .
#Text=" Korra says : " Is everyone all right ?
#Text=" Arik says : " Like you care .
#Text=" Kong says : " What the heck happened ?
#Text=" Arik says : " She said her friend needed help , then they knocked me out !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=But I could n't let you take me to the Earth Queen as a captive .
#Text=There are dangerous forces at work that you do n't know anything about .
#Text=" Kong says : " More dangerous than being stranded in the desert ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Do n't worry , Kong .
#Text=I 've radioed Ba Sing Se before we went down .
#Text=We just need to sit tight .
#Text=Somebody will be here to rescue us .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not waiting around for that .
#Text=We need to get out of here now .
#Text=" Asami says : " If we all work together , we might be able to get the ship up and running .
#Text=" Kong says : " Not likely .
#Text=I just tunneled out the engine room .
#Text=It 's like a sandbox in there .
#Text=" Captain says : " This ship is n't going anywhere .
#Text=And neither are you .
#Text=You 're prisoners and it 's our duty to transport you to the Earth Queen .
#Text=" Korra says : " You realize that I 'm the Avatar , right ?
#Text=You do n't want to fight me .
#Text=" Captain says : " I 'm afraid you are n't giving us much of a choice .
#Text=We have our orders .
#Text=" Asami says : " Wait , did that sand dune just move ?
#Text=" Captain says : " It was probably just a mirage .
#Text=The desert will play tricks on you .
#Text=" Asami says : " That 's no mirage .
#Text=Look .
#Text=" Kong says : " I heard that since all the spirits came back , this desert has been haunted by them .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh right , so I guess that 's my fault too .
#Text=Do you want to help us get this ship up and running , or do you want to wait around and meet that thing ?
#Text=" Kong says : " We want to fix the ship .
#Text=Right , Cap ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Let 's get to work .
#Text=" Korra says : " Everybody stand back .
#Text="
